channel.title: Ask a User!
channel.description: So the idea is to ask a user questions that you would like to know. Every week the next user will be nominated by the last one. Ask about any topic, it doesn't really matter. If you are the answerer you have to answer using only your knowledge, no looking anything up. Me first I suppose. Try to limit the personal questions.

item.title: Ask a User!
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Well, unfunny was a heavy word. But he’s most certainly one of those “meh, it’s OK, but i’ll never go to see a show of his” to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a User!
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Lolipopman:

What country do you hate the most?

France, I have no idea why and don’t ask.

SassyRobot:

-What’s your worst/best memory of high school and why?

-What was your favorite pet you had as a child and why?

-If you knew today was your last day on Earth, how would you spend it and why?

-What is the most rewarding experience you have had and what made it so?

-Who or what inspires you and why?

Probably beating some douchebag up.

I once had a pet dog and she recently passed away since she started having a bunch of seizures and heat strokes and she had to be put down, she was a great dog.

Knowing myself I would probably just do the same thing I do everyday as if everything was normal.

I don’t think I’ve had one yet.

I don’t see much that inspires me to make changes in my life.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a User!
item.dc:creator: Lolipopman
item.description:
Oh, that, silence.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a User!
item.dc:creator: Dr_Strangelove
item.description:
You don’t have to answer the questions that I already answered…

Still waiting on the answer to that riddle.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a User!
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Dr. Strangelove:

No it’s not toast.

What gets wetter as it dries?

A towel.

TNT:

Do australian girls swallow #!$ counter-clockwise?

I’ll lead the research on this new investigation.

hercule poirots nutsack:

how much do you know about wine

Not much.

hercule poirots nutsack:

how skilfully can you identify types of wood

As skillfully as a Wikipedia tab.

hercule poirots nutsack:

do you care about craters on the moon at all.

At one point I did but then I lost interest.

Have you ever gotten the shit kicked out of you and vice versa?

I’ve beat up a person but I never actually checked to see if he soiled himself.

SassyRobot:

How are we choosing the next person?

Nomination?

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a User!
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Acristoff:

Have you ever been involved in some kind of accident in a vehicle? (car, airplane, boat, bike…)

Been hit by a car on my bike, and almost getting squished by a truck while in a car.

Dr. Strangelove:

Smash the lightbulb and use the filiment to pick the lock. Wear the gloves to look stylish while doing so. Not really a riddle…Maybe something like “I break when you say my name” or something more difficult.

Is Patonki even here?

Toast.

I don’t think he is here.

Acristoff:

What’s the ballsiest thing you’ve ever done?

Go into a forest fire willingly.

Dr. Strangelove:

How does it feel to be the one answering questions?

Feels _____ man.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a User!
item.dc:creator: Dr_Strangelove
item.description:
You are the new answerer, I was thinking of nominating you, but you never said anything. Congradulations.

Now answer both my questions and yours. And my riddle.

Read full topic

item.description:
Brother Shrike:

You know which one lies, but you’ve used up your question and you still don’t know which door is which unless they’re standing next to their respective doors.

no. if both of them tell you they came from door number 1, then that door leads to heaven.
